Class TextAnalyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • TextAnalyzer

  • public class TextAnalyzer
extends javafx.application.Application
    Runs GUI to process word count of webpages Save and load word occurances results and display them

    Steven
